page.title: 04Population
page.content: In our block the majority of the people are either retired. There are about 121 people of whom 14 only are children under 16 years of age. This is because very few people with children can afford to buy houses as people who have lived most of their lives elsewhere are willing to pay very high prices in order to retire to the country. Many of the local families are related to each other in some way and most have been to Temple Guiting School. One pupil,Nicky Brown, searched the records of the school and found that at least 48 of his relations have attended the school since it opened in 1873 included a Great-great Aunt, Mary Hitchman, who started at school on the day it opened.
